tr_quotes.quote: En büyük zenginlik sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Virgil

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuza iyi bakın. Yaşamak zorunda olduğunuz tek yer orasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Spora vereceğimiz mana gençliğe vereceğimiz mananın öz kardeşidir.
tr_quotes.author: Peyami Safa

tr_quotes.quote: Hareket eksikliği her insanda iyi kondisyonu yok eder hareket ve metedolojik fiziksel egzersiz ise onu korur ve sürdürebilmesini sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: En sağlıklı yaşayan insanlar, sporcu grubudur.
tr_quotes.author: Forumlord

tr_quotes.quote: Fiziksel fitness yalnızca sağlıklı bir vücudun en önemli anahtarı o aynı zamanda dinamik ve yaratıcı entelektüel aktivitenin de temelidir.
tr_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Sporda başarılı olmak için bütün milletçe sporun niteliği ve değeri anlaşılmış olmak ve ona kalpten sevgiyle bağlanmak ve onu vatan görevi saymak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Spor birçok yönden iş hayatına benzer diğerleri kadar iyi ya da daha iyi olmak isterseniz onlar kadar zinde olmalısınız. Zinde ve yetenekli olduğunuz zaman iyi oyuncu ile çok iyi oyuncu arasındaki farkı belirleyen ise kararlılıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony J. F. Oneilly

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal edebilirseniz, gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Alex de Souza

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü olmayan insanın kanatları olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin sporda gösterdiği azim onun geleceğini yükseltir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Cumhuriyet, fikren, ilmen ve bedenen kuvvetli ve yüksek seviyeli muhafızlar ister.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Sabahları beynim ne yaptığımı çözene dek egzersiz yapmalıyımdır.
tr_quotes.author: M. Doble

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin sporda gösterdiği azim onun geleceğini yükseltir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hedeflerinizi yüksek tutun ve oraya varana kadar hiç durmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Bo Jackson

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye sınır koymamalısınız. Ne kadar hayal ederseniz, o kadar ileriye gidebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Michael Phelps

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlandığımız için egzersiz yapmayı bırakmıyoruz, egzersiz yapmadığımız için yaşlanıyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Dr Kenneth Copper

tr_quotes.quote: Her bir bireye ne fazla ne eksik, fakat doğru miktarda gıda ve egzersiz sunabilseydik, sağlığın en emin yolunu bulmuş olurduk.
tr_quotes.author: Hipokrat

tr_quotes.quote: Hareket eksikliği her insanda iyi kondisyonu yok eder. Hareket ve metodolojik fiziksel egzersiz ise onu korur ve sürdürülebilmesini sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığınız ile banka hesabınız aynı şey değildir. Ne kadar fazla yüklerseniz, o kadar fazla da çekebilirsiniz. Egzersiz kral, beslenme ise kraliçedir. Birlikte bir krallığınız olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer her zaman yaptığınız fiziksel veya başka türlü şeylere bir limit koyarsanız, bu o çalışmanıza ve tüm hayatınıza sıçrar. Limit yoktur. Onlar sadece eşiklerdir ve onlara takılıp kalmamalısınız, onları geçmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Spor bir insana her durumda zindelik sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlam kafa, sağlam vücutta bulunur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spora önem vermeyen milletler sürekli yeni hastaneler, tedavi merkezleri inşa etmesi gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yurt savunması bakımından bu derece ehemmiyetli olan izcilik, ferdi ve milli eğitim bakımından da o nisbette önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuza iyi bakın. Yaşamak zorunda olduğunuz tek yer orasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Zafer, zafer benimdir diyebilenin; başarı, başaracağım diye başlayanın ve başardım diyebilenindir.
tr_quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Spora eğitimli bir devlet asla yorulmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer hiç spor yapma şansınız yoksa sadece yürüyün, en güzel spordur yürümek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı insanlar olmasını ister, bazıları olmasını bekler, bazıları ise oldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sigara öldürür, spor güldürür, spor hayat verir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spor yap hayatta kal.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spora vereceğimiz mana, gençliğe vereceğimiz mananın öz kardeşidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spor yapmak uzun yaşamak için bir araçtır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spor toplumsal kaynaşma aracıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlıklı olmak için daima spor yapılmalıdır, mal mülk bir yere kadar sağlık satın alınamayacağından dolayı sporun yapılması gereklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akıl ve doğru düşüncenin sağlam yani sporcularda bulunacağını dile getirmiştir. Sporcu olan işlerini daha kolay şekilde yaparak giderebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yorgunluk her insan, her mahluk için tabii bir haldir. Fakat insanda yorgunluğu yenebilecek manevi bir kuvvet vardır ki, işte bu kuvvet yorulanları dinlendirmeden yürütür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çocuklara sporun bugünkü tekniğini öğretmek ve bunlardan bir kısmını bazı törenlerde ve bayramlarda dekor olarak koymak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Spor ve eğitime ağırlık veren bir devlet ileriye doğru adım adım ilerler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sporun olmadığı bir millet sağlam kafaya sahip olmadığından dolayı gerileyecektir. Spor zihnin anahtarı olmaktadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her insan spor yapmalı erken yaşta yoksa sonu ya toprak ya yatak olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hareket eksikliği her insanda iyi kondisyonu yok eder hareket ve metedolojik fiziksel egzersiz ise onu korur ve sürdürebilmesini sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplum yalnız spor ile rengini ve kuvvetini değiştiremez. Orada hakim olan sıhhi sosyal medeni birçok gerek ve şartların teminine yönelen teşebbüs ve tedbirlerin uygulanması lazımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milletin sporda gösterdiği azim onun geleceğini yükseltir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük zenginlik sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sporsuz bir millet gerilemeye mahkûmdur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get
en_quotes.author: Michael Phelps

en_quotes.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts
en_quotes.author: Dan Gable

en_quotes.quote: Sports not only build better athletes but also better people
en_quotes.author: Julie Foudy

en_quotes.quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match
en_quotes.author: Mia Hamm

en_quotes.quote: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry
en_quotes.author: Earl Monroe

en_quotes.quote: That's one thing you learn in sports. You don't give up; you fight to the finish
en_quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

en_quotes.quote: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: Sports do not build character. They reveal it
en_quotes.author: Heywood Broun

en_quotes.quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over
en_quotes.author: Frank Gifford

en_quotes.quote: I was always into sports, and as a sportsperson, you need to be fit to survive and play from start to finish
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: If you think it's hard to meet new people, try picking up the wrong golf ball
en_quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

en_quotes.quote: The only athletic sport I ever mastered was backgammon
en_quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

en_quotes.quote: I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Michael Phelps

en_quotes.quote: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports
en_quotes.author: Kapil Dev

en_quotes.quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be
en_quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

en_quotes.quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: Sports should not become routine. It should be about passion
en_quotes.author: Kapil Dev

en_quotes.quote: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars
en_quotes.author: Mario Lopez

en_quotes.quote: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things
en_quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Sports are a great place to show that equality can happen
en_quotes.author: Venus Williams

en_quotes.quote: Wherever I go, I now easily get the attention of the sports fraternity
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: Golf is a good walk spoiled
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Half the lies they tell about me aren't true
en_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

en_quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it
en_quotes.author: Knute Rockne

en_quotes.quote: The team has come along slow but fast
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run
en_quotes.author: Babe Ruth

en_quotes.quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear
en_quotes.author: Sandy Koufax

en_quotes.quote: A lifetime of training for just ten seconds
en_quotes.author: Jesse Owens

en_quotes.quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air
en_quotes.author: Jack Benny

en_quotes.quote: I like a few vintage Rolexes, and Panerais are good. I'm not into sports watches - I like chronometers
en_quotes.author: Jason Statham

en_quotes.quote: I can't say Boston is 'home-home.' It's definitely a place I'm growing accustomed to. It's such a great sports town
en_quotes.author: Wes Welker

en_quotes.quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: If it doesn't matter who wins or loses, then why do they keep score?
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok
en_quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

en_quotes.quote: I went to a fight the other night, and a hockey game broke out
en_quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

en_quotes.quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you
en_quotes.author: Satchel Paige

en_quotes.quote: But sports carried me away from being in a gang, or being associated with drugs. Sports was my way out
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

en_quotes.quote: I'd just as soon play tennis with the net down
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators
en_quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

en_quotes.quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: When doing sports... on the water, it's crucial to stop aging by protecting your skin
en_quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

en_quotes.quote: Tennis doesn't owe me anything. Tennis is one of the fairest sports. It's given me so many extraordinary feelings
en_quotes.author: David Ferrer

en_quotes.quote: Economics is about creating win-win situations. But in sports, someone loses
en_quotes.author: Stan Kroenke

en_quotes.quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything
en_quotes.author: Demetri Martin

en_quotes.quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: For many sports fans, the onset of fall only means one thing: It's football season!
en_quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

en_quotes.quote: The only thing a golfer needs is more daylight
en_quotes.author: Ben Hogan

en_quotes.quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty
en_quotes.author: Harry Vardon

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with jogging is that the ice falls out of your glass
en_quotes.author: Martin Mull

en_quotes.quote: I'm one of these people that likes adrenaline and new things, like extreme sports. It makes me feel alive
en_quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

en_quotes.quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square
en_quotes.author: Pete Rose

en_quotes.quote: Fans don't boo nobodies
en_quotes.author: Reggie Jackson

en_quotes.quote: With sports, there's no entitlement on the field. It's about numbers. It's about results. It's about outcomes
en_quotes.author: Maynard Webb

en_quotes.quote: Football is an incredible game. Sometimes it's so incredible, it's unbelievable
en_quotes.author: Tom Landry

en_quotes.quote: I love various sports, including basketball, tennis and billiards
en_quotes.author: Yani Tseng

en_quotes.quote: In sports, teams win and individuals don't
en_quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

en_quotes.quote: Video games offer violent messages, and even the sports video games include taunting and teasing
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Canada

en_quotes.quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose
en_quotes.author: Ernie Banks

en_quotes.quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors
en_quotes.author: Frank Gifford

en_quotes.quote: Sports have become increasingly more specialized, but that doesn't mean they shouldn't be fun
en_quotes.author: Mia Hamm

en_quotes.quote: I think team sports probably teach you more about giving - about being unselfish and being flexible
en_quotes.author: Chris Evert

en_quotes.quote: In professional sports, you live in the moment, and that's what I love about it
en_quotes.author: Reggie Miller

en_quotes.quote: Maybe because I am from a sports background, I don't give up easily. I am a fighter
en_quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

en_quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: There is a syndrome in sports called 'paralysis by analysis.'
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: I see great things in baseball. It's our game - the American game
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: I'm not much involved in sports, and I don't play, either
en_quotes.author: Kriti Sanon

en_quotes.quote: If you look at all aspects of all sports, everything comes down to basics and fundamentals
en_quotes.author: Robbie Lawler

en_quotes.quote: I won't have any competitive instincts in any sports, other than golf. I can't see being competitive in sports any more
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: You wouldn't have won if we'd beaten you
en_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

en_quotes.quote: Baseball has the great advantage over cricket of being sooner ended
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Sports without music, it's nothing but a game. Music adds the emotion
en_quotes.author: Ice Cube

en_quotes.quote: Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: I like sports, and I enjoy playing basketball and lifting weights
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I wasn't really a work-conscious type of person. I was a player. I loved to play sports
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Sports is the toy department of human life
en_quotes.author: Howard Cosell

en_quotes.quote: Hitting is timing. Pitching is upsetting timing
en_quotes.author: Warren Spahn

en_quotes.quote: The game of golf would lose a great deal if croquet mallets and billiard cues were allowed on the putting green
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: If a tie is like kissing your sister, losing is like kissing you grandmother with her teeth out
en_quotes.author: George Brett

en_quotes.quote: Life is about timing
en_quotes.author: Carl Lewis

en_quotes.quote: When I used to play sports, I'd be the one cheering the team on, 'Come on, we can beat these guys!' That's just in me
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: I'm a football fan, a sports fan, a fan of competition
en_quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

en_quotes.quote: To find a man's true character, play golf with him
en_quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

en_quotes.quote: The problem with winter sports is that - follow me closely here - they generally take place in winter
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: Approach the game with no preset agendas and you'll probably come away surprised at your overall efforts
en_quotes.author: Phil Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: All hockey players are bilingual. They know English and profanity
en_quotes.author: Gordie Howe

en_quotes.quote: Bulls do not win bull fights. People do
en_quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Sports is one of the keys to my life. It definitely kept me out of a lot of trouble and gave me a lot of discipline
en_quotes.author: Freddie Gibbs

en_quotes.quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break
en_quotes.author: John Madden

en_quotes.quote: If a man can beat you, walk him
en_quotes.author: Satchel Paige

en_quotes.quote: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: I'm a huge sports fan
en_quotes.author: Marc Anthony

en_quotes.quote: If you meet the Buddha in the lane, feed him the ball
en_quotes.author: Phil Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Sports are a microcosm of society
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: The uglier a man's legs are, the better he plays golf - it's almost a law
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: I hate all sports as rabidly as a person who likes sports hates common sense
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: I hate ready-made suits, button-down collars, and sports shirts
en_quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

en_quotes.quote: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt
en_quotes.author: Dean Martin

en_quotes.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference
en_quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

en_quotes.quote: The crowd makes the ballgame
en_quotes.author: Ty Cobb

en_quotes.quote: Play is the only way the highest intelligence of humankind can unfold
en_quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

en_quotes.quote: The two most important things in life are good friends and a strong bullpen
en_quotes.author: Bob Lemon

en_quotes.quote: Sports is the only entertainment where, no matter how many times you go back, you never know the ending
en_quotes.author: Neil Simon

en_quotes.quote: These days the temptation to use steroids in sports has become too great for many young athletes
en_quotes.author: Jim Sensenbrenner

en_quotes.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Most ball games are lost, not won
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: In Boston, they love their sports celebrities. And it's great
en_quotes.author: Tom Brady

en_quotes.quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: I think every school in the world should have a sports program
en_quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: Tiger Woods is the only sports star who's worth every penny he makes
en_quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

en_quotes.quote: I love sports. Whenever I can, I always watch the Detroit Tigers on the radio
en_quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

en_quotes.quote: More entertainers should come forward to support sports. I'd love to see Akshay Kumar in a film on Indian martial arts
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: I didn't go to normal children school. I went to sports school when I was 8. So I studied martial arts
en_quotes.author: Jet Li

en_quotes.quote: It's important for girls to feel strong and powerful even when they're playing sports
en_quotes.author: Christen Press

en_quotes.quote: Every great batter works on the theory that the pitcher is more afraid of him than he is of the pitcher
en_quotes.author: Ty Cobb

en_quotes.quote: I like to walk around my apartment naked. I like sitting around in the nude watching sports, actually
en_quotes.author: Kylie Bax

en_quotes.quote: In sports... you play from the time you're eight years old, and then you're done forever
en_quotes.author: Joe Montana

en_quotes.quote: I danced for 12 years, and I played a lot team sports: basketball, volleyball
en_quotes.author: Gal Gadot

en_quotes.quote: My greatest memories as a kid were playing sports with my dad and watching sports with my dad
en_quotes.author: Mark Teixeira

en_quotes.quote: Baseball is drama with an endless run and an ever-changing cast
en_quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

en_quotes.quote: The Olympic Games are always in the head of every sports athlete. We work for that
en_quotes.author: Tina Maze

en_quotes.quote: That's the biggest gap in sports, the difference between the winner and the loser of the Super Bowl
en_quotes.author: John Madden

en_quotes.quote: I spend a little time every day to play sports
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: I think extreme sports are really good for relieving stress
en_quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

en_quotes.quote: Nobody wants to buy a $60,000 electric Civic. But people will pay $90,000 for an electric sports car
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I come from a family that has always emphasized and enjoyed sports - golf, tennis, football, baseball and the rest
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to use sports for social change
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: The plays and sports of children are as salutary to them as labor and work are to grown persons
en_quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

en_quotes.quote: Whatever free time I get, I love to catch news and sports shows
en_quotes.author: Amitabh Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: Political columnists and sports pundits are rewarded for being overconfident
en_quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

en_quotes.quote: My symbol was always a polo player because I liked sports, and polo has a stylishness to it
en_quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

en_quotes.quote: I'll let the racket do the talking
en_quotes.author: John McEnroe

en_quotes.quote: You win some, lose some, and wreck some
en_quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

en_quotes.quote: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore,' shoot six, and write down five
en_quotes.author: Paul Harvey

en_quotes.quote: I used to play a lot of racket sports, tennis and squash
en_quotes.author: Jason Statham

en_quotes.quote: My whole family is missing that sports gene. I hope I didn't screw that up by marrying a great golfer
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Sports saved my life
en_quotes.author: Caitlyn Jenner

en_quotes.quote: Baseball life is a tough life on the family
en_quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

en_quotes.quote: You know it's going to hell when the best rapper out there is white and the best golfer is black
en_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

en_quotes.quote: I'm a huge sports fan, and I'm a huge entertainment fan
en_quotes.author: Mauro Ranallo

en_quotes.quote: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature
en_quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

en_quotes.quote: I don't know anything that builds the will to win better than competitive sports
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: I am big into water sports and just being out on the water. That is second nature to me, being from Florida
en_quotes.author: Jake Owen

en_quotes.quote: I didn't have any friends. I was bullied. I didn't play sports
en_quotes.author: Dacre Montgomery

en_quotes.quote: Loyalty and communication are always rewarded in sports
en_quotes.author: Cheech Marin

en_quotes.quote: Denver is home to me, and to be recognized for my achievements in the sports community here is a great honor
en_quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

en_quotes.quote: The success or failing in one competition doesn't define you, and that is one thing that any sports would teach you
en_quotes.author: Sandeep Singh

en_quotes.quote: I started playing ball when I was a kid. My dad was a pro ball player and he passed on his knowledge to me
en_quotes.author: Kurt Russell

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes in football you have to score goals
en_quotes.author: Thierry Henry

en_quotes.quote: I was always encouraged to participate in whatever sports I wanted to be in
en_quotes.author: Elana Meyers

en_quotes.quote: I enjoyed being involved in team sports and making close friendships
en_quotes.author: Brian McBride

en_quotes.quote: I am fortunate to be on board with one of India's top sports management group
en_quotes.author: Hima Das

en_quotes.quote: Mostly I play sports games - football and basketball. 'Inside Drive' and 'NFL Fever.'
en_quotes.author: Paul Pierce

en_quotes.quote: I've been a sports fan forever
en_quotes.author: Kygo

en_quotes.quote: Funding for sports (and the arts) are often the first things facing the chop in difficult times
en_quotes.author: Lucy Powell

en_quotes.quote: If I was invincible, maybe I would take up some extreme sports
en_quotes.author: Tom Welling

en_quotes.quote: I stopped doing any organized sports at 10 and started dancing
en_quotes.author: Grant Gustin

en_quotes.quote: I'm glad you're doing this story on us and not on the WNBA. We're so much prettier than all the other women in sports
en_quotes.author: Martina Hingis

en_quotes.quote: In the field of sports you are more or less accepted for what you do rather than what you are
en_quotes.author: Althea Gibson

en_quotes.quote: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure
en_quotes.author: Eric Liddell

en_quotes.quote: I love sports. I love being active. I love challenging myself. I was a jock growing up from the time I could walk
en_quotes.author: Lara Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture
en_quotes.author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

en_quotes.quote: My first waitress job was at Johnny Rockets in New Jersey, and then I waited tables at a sports bar
en_quotes.author: Melissa Rauch

en_quotes.quote: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple
en_quotes.author: Barry Switzer

en_quotes.quote: My heart lies in music and acting, however, my inspiration comes from adrenaline rush I get from sports... and life
en_quotes.author: Alexander Ludwig

en_quotes.quote: Unless you enjoy life passionately, you cannot be a good artiste. Practise what you like, be it sports or dancing
en_quotes.author: Sarita Choudhury

en_quotes.quote: I grew up very much in a sporting background. I always wanted to be an actor, but my escapism always came in sports
en_quotes.author: Bradley James

en_quotes.quote: Unlike any other business in the United States, sports must preserve an illusion of perfect innocence
en_quotes.author: Lewis H. Lapham

en_quotes.quote: I play sports - like, I play a little bit of tennis, swimming, like a normal kid. I watch movies
en_quotes.author: Joey Alexander

en_quotes.quote: I'm really into extreme sports and just having fun
en_quotes.author: Kellan Lutz

en_quotes.quote: The two most important things in my life were academics and sports. I had to do my schoolwork first
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Luna

en_quotes.quote: To have five brothers be successful in sports is awesome
en_quotes.author: Glenn Gronkowski

en_quotes.quote: Extreme sports tricks are becoming increasingly complex, the courses ever more challenging and crashes all too common
en_quotes.author: Lucy Walker

en_quotes.quote: Golf is played by twenty million mature American men whose wives think they are out having fun
en_quotes.author: Jim Bishop

en_quotes.quote: Because I just like sports, I like athletics and I like competition
en_quotes.author: Trishelle Cannatella

en_quotes.quote: You see so many different personalities and mind-sets in the world of sports, just like you do with actors
en_quotes.author: Marc Blucas

en_quotes.quote: I don't watch too much TV when it comes to sports or news or things like that
en_quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

en_quotes.quote: For truly it is to be noted, that children's plays are not sports, and should be deemed as their most serious actions
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: We don't see a lot of models for male social interaction. There's sports and barn raisings
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: Cleveland, as a whole, is a great sports town. People love the Browns here
en_quotes.author: Baker Mayfield

en_quotes.quote: Skiing combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: Politics should not interfere with sports. And sports should impact politics
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: Museums are like sports stadiums, hotels and hospitals: they are in the category of captive-audience dining
en_quotes.author: Danny Meyer

en_quotes.quote: It sucks. When you're a woman in sports, people want you to show some skin
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Bleiler

en_quotes.quote: Being involved in sports, you think less about how your body looks and more how it performs
en_quotes.author: Gretchen Bleiler

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of sports - even foreign sports - is not to bore people
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Growing up, we played sports nonstop. I mean every single day. As soon I got done with breakfast, I was ready to go
en_quotes.author: Walter Payton

en_quotes.quote: It's a crazy world, so sports and athletics and music can be a form of escapism
en_quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

en_quotes.quote: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball
en_quotes.author: Bobby Knight

en_quotes.quote: I was focused on athletics, outdoors, sports
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: I was lucky enough when it came to sports and work ethic to be taught some basics that continue to be important
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: Where I came from, sports were the only way to get out front
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: I was into sports and dancing. I ran track. I have a lot of stamina
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: I made the cover of 'Sports Illustrated,' 'Newsweek' and 'Time' all in one week, and I didn't even know what that meant
en_quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

en_quotes.quote: Sports without music is just a game. Music makes it entertaining
en_quotes.author: Ice Cube

en_quotes.quote: It's hard to create new friendships outside sports
en_quotes.author: Tim Tebow

en_quotes.quote: When you think about the NASCAR brand, it resonates everywhere. They have the No. 1 sports brand
en_quotes.author: Magic Johnson

en_quotes.quote: My work ethic is from sports
en_quotes.author: Magic Johnson

en_quotes.quote: When did I know I had talent? I think it started when I first started playing sports, organized sports
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: You don't hurt 'em if you don't hit 'em
en_quotes.author: Chesty Puller

en_quotes.quote: I know I could be the host of 'SportsCenter' in two years if I changed my show today to sports
en_quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

en_quotes.quote: Sports has kept me on the straight and narrow path
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big sports fan
en_quotes.author: David Chang

en_quotes.quote: Your body's really only meant to compete at the highest levels of combat sports for a few years
en_quotes.author: Joe Rogan

en_quotes.quote: I never in my wildest imagination dreamed that I would somehow become a sports commentator
en_quotes.author: Joe Rogan

en_quotes.quote: I love all motor sports at the top level
en_quotes.author: Mario Andretti

en_quotes.quote: In terms of merit, sports has mathematical statistics. That's how you know who the best player is
en_quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: I think that every single person should play sports
en_quotes.author: Donovan Bailey

en_quotes.quote: In sports, big names and celebrities drive events, and that's what people gravitate to
en_quotes.author: Donovan Bailey

en_quotes.quote: He has the finest, fundamentally sound golf swing I've ever seen
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

en_quotes.quote: My dad told us up front, 'Guys, if you want to play sports, go ahead, but it's your decision.'
en_quotes.author: Peyton Manning

en_quotes.quote: I cherished my time playing high school sports
en_quotes.author: Peyton Manning

en_quotes.quote: Tennis is definitely a star for women in sports
en_quotes.author: Venus Williams

en_quotes.quote: I spent my whole life playing sports and training and pushing myself to the limits
en_quotes.author: Venus Williams

en_quotes.quote: Tennis was a white, upper-class sport, and I wanted it to be treated like other sports were
en_quotes.author: John McEnroe

en_quotes.quote: If you got the game, you got the game. That's why Tiger Woods is out there playing golf with Greg Norman
en_quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

en_quotes.quote: It's so important for kids to get involved with sports in general at a young age
en_quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

en_quotes.quote: Since childhood, sports has been one of the most important influences in my life
en_quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

en_quotes.quote: Black people dominate sports in the United States. 20% of the population and 90% of the final four
en_quotes.author: Chris Rock

en_quotes.quote: Buying involves decision-making. It's a performance activity, like sports or acting
en_quotes.author: Mark Goulston

en_quotes.quote: I'm not super into sports
en_quotes.author: Jack Antonoff

en_quotes.quote: Books had instant replay long before televised sports
en_quotes.author: Bernard Williams

en_quotes.quote: I come from a family of four brothers, so I like sports
en_quotes.author: Jurnee Smollett-Bell

en_quotes.quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence
en_quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

en_quotes.quote: What passes for sports coverage is terribly sycophantic
en_quotes.author: Billy Crystal

en_quotes.quote: My dad is not a sports guy but was drawn to the theatrics of wrestling
en_quotes.author: John Cena

en_quotes.quote: I think sports are meant to unite people
en_quotes.author: Caster Semenya

en_quotes.quote: I did some sports. It was a bit frustrating. I wasn't the greatest sports person
en_quotes.author: Tim Burton

en_quotes.quote: We're not doing outrageous fashion; I make sports clothes that are relatively conservative, clothes that everyone wears
en_quotes.author: Calvin Klein

en_quotes.quote: You can't win unless you learn how to lose
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: In sports, everything is a process
en_quotes.author: Nick Foles

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to spoil this for anybody but wrestling, sports entertainment, is 'pre-determined.'
en_quotes.author: Diamond Dallas Page

en_quotes.quote: At Barca, players were banned from driving their sports cars to training
en_quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

en_quotes.quote: I'm always fascinated by the use of the first-person plural talking about sports
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: I thought my sports career was over once I got into a wheelchair. That was the hardest reality I had to face
en_quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

en_quotes.quote: I played sports. I had boyfriends. I loved high school
en_quotes.author: Ann Coulter

en_quotes.quote: Sports are sports. Its all about how we carry ourselves out of the ring
en_quotes.author: George Foreman

en_quotes.quote: I got into sports because that was a way to prove your masculinity. I was good at it
en_quotes.author: Caitlyn Jenner

en_quotes.quote: You cannot mix sports with politics
en_quotes.author: Jackie Chan

en_quotes.quote: I am a sports fanatic
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: Since childhood, I was ingrained into sports. It plays an important part in my life
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: I have done 'Sports Illustrated,' but I don't regret it because it portrayed me in a positive way - as an athlete
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: I started off playing sports when I was five years old. I played three or four sports all throughout the year
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: There's a whole lot more to the African-American community than entertainment and sports
en_quotes.author: J. C. Watts

en_quotes.quote: When you write about sports, you're allowed to engage in mischief. Nothing is at stake
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

en_quotes.quote: Natural hydration is a key factor in any type of sports performance
en_quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

en_quotes.quote: Sports of every sort had always appealed to me
en_quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

en_quotes.quote: The sickle-cell got me where doctors said I couldn't play sports, I couldn't overexert myself
en_quotes.author: Prodigy

en_quotes.quote: People in the States used to think that if girls were good at sports their sexuality would be affected
en_quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

en_quotes.quote: I've given many lessons in many sports over the years to many different people
en_quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

en_quotes.quote: I'm girlie in the sense that I like makeup, but I also love sports and man food
en_quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

en_quotes.quote: My exercise regime is a mix of gymming, marital arts, sports, etc
en_quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big sports fan in general
en_quotes.author: Luke Bryan

en_quotes.quote: All sports for all people
en_quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

en_quotes.quote: I want to encourage more people in small villages to take up sports
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: I want to create as many opportunities as possible for people inclined towards sports
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: Sports is like a war without the killing
en_quotes.author: Ted Turner

en_quotes.quote: I did everything - I did newscasts, I did sports, I did dramas
en_quotes.author: Alex Trebek

en_quotes.quote: All the minor sports injuries you acquire over the years begin to multiply like flies when you get over 70
en_quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

en_quotes.quote: All good sports reporters know that the best stories are in the loser's locker room
en_quotes.author: Pete Hamill

en_quotes.quote: I watch sports and cable news. I'm a political junkie, so that's my interest
en_quotes.author: Jerry Springer

en_quotes.quote: I'm a character and a sports entertainer and a wrestler, but I'm also a father and a husband and a provider
en_quotes.author: Roman Reigns

en_quotes.quote: Well, I'm not a big sports fan
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

en_quotes.quote: I've never bought a sports car
en_quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

en_quotes.quote: When you look at how the sports world is changing, you have to figure out how to become different than everyone else
en_quotes.author: Kevin Harvick

en_quotes.quote: You cannot win if you cannot run
en_quotes.author: Hank Stram

en_quotes.quote: Nobody roots for Goliath
en_quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: The growth of women's soccer and women's sports all around the world has been slow
en_quotes.author: Abby Wambach

en_quotes.quote: Football is a simple game. Twenty-two men chase a ball for 90 minutes and at the end, the Germans always win
en_quotes.author: Gary Lineker

en_quotes.quote: If something touches on the world of sports, ESPN has never told me that I cannot discuss a sports-related matter
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Smith

en_quotes.quote: My family was heavily into sports
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Smith

en_quotes.quote: I never was a great sports player. In fact, in fourth grade, I had the second to the worst softball throw
en_quotes.author: Amy Klobuchar

en_quotes.quote: Boxing has become America's tragic theater
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: Boxing is a celebration of the lost religion of masculinity all the more trenchant for its being lost
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: I always wanted to be a sports broadcaster
en_quotes.author: James Carville

en_quotes.quote: I was a sports kid
en_quotes.author: Mahershala Ali

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to play golf. When I hit a ball, I want someone else to go chase it
en_quotes.author: Rogers Hornsby

en_quotes.quote: Thank you... fantasy football draft, for letting me know that even in my fantasies, I am bad at sports
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

en_quotes.quote: If a lot of people gripped a knife and fork the way they do a golf club, they'd starve to death
en_quotes.author: Sam Snead

en_quotes.quote: Even if I did have, you know, a 'Sports Illustrated' body, I'd still wear elegant clothes
en_quotes.author: Adele

en_quotes.quote: I get very into my sports
en_quotes.author: Margot Robbie

en_quotes.quote: Relax? How can anybody relax and play golf? You have to grip the club, don't you?
en_quotes.author: Ben Hogan

en_quotes.quote: It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come
en_quotes.author: Jennie Finch

en_quotes.quote: You know they're not going to lose 162 consecutive games
en_quotes.author: Harry Caray

en_quotes.quote: Sports are something that, for the most part, are for kids, and if you're able to extend your career, you're very lucky
en_quotes.author: Chael Sonnen

en_quotes.quote: I played professional level sports. When you're playing for money, it's a whole other level
en_quotes.author: Kurt Russell

en_quotes.quote: I come from a small town in Ohio and was always into sports
en_quotes.author: Jake Paul

en_quotes.quote: I ain't never did no sports. I just always wanted to rap
en_quotes.author: Takeoff

en_quotes.quote: When Quavo was out doing sports, I was in the studio, what we call the bando, making music, going hard
en_quotes.author: Takeoff

en_quotes.quote: I've aways been good at picking up certain things, like sports and dancing
en_quotes.author: Channing Tatum

en_quotes.quote: Babe Ruth is an icon, in sports and in our society
en_quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: I was always a mean and lean athlete - not tall - not large
en_quotes.author: Edwin Moses

en_quotes.quote: I overcame size with mechanics
en_quotes.author: Edwin Moses

en_quotes.quote: Of course the first version of an all-electric sports car is going to be expensive
en_quotes.author: Jason Calacanis

en_quotes.quote: Girls can be funny and play sports and show how to do the perfect soccer kick if they want
en_quotes.author: Eva Gutowski

en_quotes.quote: I play in the low 80s. If it's any hotter than that, I won't play
en_quotes.author: Joe E. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: What's a good tournament for him? Winning it. He's good enough
en_quotes.author: Greg Norman

en_quotes.quote: Any time Detroit scores more than 100 points and holds the other team below 100 points they almost always win
en_quotes.author: Doug Collins

en_quotes.quote: Eighteen holes of match play will teach you more about your foe than 18 years of dealing with him across a desk
en_quotes.author: Grantland Rice

en_quotes.quote: If you want experiences to make you a better person, then you play two or three sports
en_quotes.author: Jim Brown

en_quotes.quote: I have to wear two sports bras when I do my cardio. It takes a lot to hold these puppies up!
en_quotes.author: Fergie

en_quotes.quote: Well, if I hadn't have been an actor I would have gone on to play college sports
en_quotes.author: Joe Manganiello

en_quotes.quote: I hated sports at school. Almost everyone did
en_quotes.author: Naomi Alderman

en_quotes.quote: My sister is totally my dad's daughter because she loves sports
en_quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

en_quotes.quote: Discrimination and prejudice of any kind have no place in sports or in our society
en_quotes.author: Jerry Reinsdorf

en_quotes.quote: There are only two seasons - winter and Baseball
en_quotes.author: Bill Veeck

en_quotes.quote: You don't really grow up until you quit playing sports
en_quotes.author: Richard Linklater

en_quotes.quote: I got into sports, thankfully, because I didn't listen to my mother
en_quotes.author: Dat Nguyen

en_quotes.quote: In any small town, sports are really important to the high school, and I wasn't very good at sports
en_quotes.author: Martina McBride

en_quotes.quote: When we grew up, we wanted to do two things: to own a sports team and a casino
en_quotes.author: Dan Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: I do not like sports, unless you consider treating all humankind with love and respect a sport
en_quotes.author: Todd Barry

en_quotes.quote: The mental side of sports, it's huge. It's such a massive part of the game
en_quotes.author: Kyle Korver

en_quotes.quote: I love to talk about sports. I love sports; it's just something that's in my nature
en_quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: Every guy should have a fantasy sports team
en_quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: Have you ever noticed what golf spells backwards?
en_quotes.author: Al Boliska

en_quotes.quote: It is almost impossible to remember how tragic a place the world is when one is playing golf
en_quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

en_quotes.quote: Sports entertainment in general, it's a very competitive business
en_quotes.author: Eric Bischoff

en_quotes.quote: In football, time and space are the same thing
en_quotes.author: Graham Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Football is violence and cold weather and sex and college rye
en_quotes.author: Roger Kahn

en_quotes.quote: I was showing early symptoms of becoming a professional baseball man. I was lying to the press
en_quotes.author: Roger Kahn

en_quotes.quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched
en_quotes.author: Roger Kahn

en_quotes.quote: I think sports can bring a lot of happiness to people
en_quotes.author: Miguel Cabrera

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to run a professional football team. I'd love to run the USTA, be the sports editor of the 'New York Times.'
en_quotes.author: Jeff Zucker

en_quotes.quote: I went through baseball as 'a player to be named later.'
en_quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

en_quotes.quote: One thing you learned as a Cubs fan: when you bought you ticket, you could bank on seeing the bottom of the ninth
en_quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

en_quotes.quote: Every single model wants to be in 'Sports Illustrated,' and I feel extremely blessed to have that opportunity
en_quotes.author: Katherine Webb

en_quotes.quote: My family knew, but most of the sporting world did not realize that my right hand been some 75% paralyzed
en_quotes.author: Bill Toomey

en_quotes.quote: Skating, like all other sports, has an element of strategy
en_quotes.author: Tara Lipinski

en_quotes.quote: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing
en_quotes.author: Greg LeMond

en_quotes.quote: He hits the ball a long way and he knows how to win
en_quotes.author: Gary McCord

en_quotes.quote: I'm not buddy-buddy with the players. If they need a buddy, let them buy a dog
en_quotes.author: Whitey Herzog

en_quotes.quote: The integrity of the game is everything
en_quotes.author: Peter Ueberroth

en_quotes.quote: Other sports play once a week but this sport is with us every day
en_quotes.author: Peter Ueberroth

en_quotes.quote: Badminton in Beijing is huge - it's one of their top three sports
en_quotes.author: Howard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Talk radio has almost ruined the sports fan
en_quotes.author: Phil Simms

en_quotes.quote: I grew up playing sports. There is a clear line between success and failure
en_quotes.author: Tiki Barber

en_quotes.quote: Baseball is a man maker
en_quotes.author: Al Spalding

en_quotes.quote: The bell that tolls for all in boxing belongs to a cash register
en_quotes.author: Bob Verdi

en_quotes.quote: What's unfortunate about buying a pitcher for $12 million is that he carries no warranty
en_quotes.author: Bob Verdi

en_quotes.quote: There are two theories on hitting the knuckleball. Unfortunately, neither of them works
en_quotes.author: Charley Lau

en_quotes.quote: Trying to sneak a fastball past Hank Aaron is like trying to sneak the sunrise past a rooster
en_quotes.author: Joe Adcock

en_quotes.quote: The difference in golf and government is that in golf you can't improve your lie
en_quotes.author: George Deukmejian
